body_html:
Here is what the function could look like (edited in github, so no idea if it works).

::tensorflow::ShapeHandle dims;
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->WithRank(c->input(0), 4, &dims));
::tensorflow::DimensionHandle channels;
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->Dim(dims, 3, &channels))

::tensorflow::ShapeHandle dims_rois;
// Not sure what the rank of this input should be
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->WithRankAtLeast(c->input(1), 1, &dims_rois));
::tensorflow::DimensionHandle num_rois;
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->Dim(dims_rois, 0, &channels))

int64 pooled_height;
int64 pooled_width;
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->GetAttr("pooled_height", &pooled_height));
TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR(c->GetAttr("pooled_width", &pooled_width));

::tensorflow::DimensionHandle output = c->MakeShape({num_rois, pooled_height, pooled_width, channels});
c->set_output(0, output);
c->set_output(1, output);
return ::tensorflow::Status::OK();
